content:
Is it possible to be online on two or more zulip servers in the same mobile Android app at the same time?

Something like discord.

I suspect that it isn't possible,but just wanna make sure?

Ok, I think I found it.

The concept of _Add another Account_ confused me.

But I've added the other server, and now I just _switch Accounts_
Yeah, I currently do that with several different servers.
And it does stay connected to all of them, insofar as I get notifications from the app for different instances.

Great, good to know that.
Thanks Josh!
